targets.rawSql:
SELECT CASE status WHEN 'u' THEN 'Up' ELSE 'Down' END AS status, MAX(count) AS status_cnt
FROM (
    SELECT status, COUNT(*)
    FROM pg_catalog.gp_segment_configuration
    WHERE content <> -1
    GROUP BY status
    UNION 
    SELECT 'd', 0
    UNION 
    SELECT 'u', 0) foo
GROUP BY status
ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT Version[1] FROM (SELECT regexp_matches(VERSION(), '.*Greenplum Database(.*) build commit.*') AS Version) A;

SELECT 
  FLOOR((EXTRACT(epoch FROM now())/60)*60) AS "time", 
  ROUND(100 * SUM(bytes_available::DECIMAL/1024/1024/1024) / SUM(total_bytes::DECIMAL/1024/1024/1024), 2) AS "Free Disk Space (%)"
FROM gpcc_disk_now_view dnv
WHERE
  hosttype = 'master'
GROUP BY 
  1

SELECT 
  FLOOR((EXTRACT(epoch FROM now())/60)*60) AS "time",
  ROUND(SUM(bytes_available::DECIMAL), 2) AS "Disk Space Free"
FROM gpcc_disk_now_view dnv
WHERE
  hosttype = 'master'
GROUP BY 
  1

SELECT 
  FLOOR((EXTRACT(epoch FROM now())/60)*60) AS "time",
  ROUND(100 * SUM(bytes_used::DECIMAL/1024/1024/1024) / SUM(total_bytes::DECIMAL/1024/1024/1024), 2) AS "Disk Space in Use (%)"
FROM gpcc_disk_now_view dnv
WHERE
  hosttype = 'master'
GROUP BY 
  1

SELECT 
  FLOOR((EXTRACT(epoch FROM now())/60)*60) AS "time",
  ROUND(SUM(bytes_used::DECIMAL), 2) AS "Disk Space in Use"
FROM gpcc_disk_now_view dnv
WHERE
  hosttype = 'master'
GROUP BY 
  1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime,$__interval),
  max(queries_running) AS "Running",
  max(queries_queued) AS "Queued",
  max(queries_blocked) AS "Blocked"
FROM database_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  FLOOR((EXTRACT(epoch FROM now())/60)*60) AS "time", 
  ROUND(100 * SUM(bytes_available::DECIMAL/1024/1024/1024) / SUM(total_bytes::DECIMAL/1024/1024/1024), 2) AS "Free Disk Space (%)"
FROM gpcc_disk_now_view dnv
WHERE
  hosttype = 'sdw'
GROUP BY 
  1

SELECT 
  FLOOR((EXTRACT(epoch FROM now())/60)*60) AS "time",
  ROUND(SUM(bytes_available::DECIMAL), 2) AS "Disk Space Free"
FROM gpcc_disk_now_view dnv
WHERE
  hosttype = 'sdw'
GROUP BY 
  1

SELECT 
  FLOOR((EXTRACT(epoch FROM now())/60)*60) AS "time",
  ROUND(100 * SUM(bytes_used::DECIMAL/1024/1024/1024) / SUM(total_bytes::DECIMAL/1024/1024/1024), 2) AS "Disk Space in Use (%)"
FROM gpcc_disk_now_view dnv
WHERE
  hosttype = 'sdw'
GROUP BY 
  1

SELECT 
  FLOOR((EXTRACT(epoch FROM now())/60)*60) AS "time",
  ROUND(SUM(bytes_used::DECIMAL), 2) AS "Disk Space in Use"
FROM gpcc_disk_now_view dnv
WHERE
  hosttype = 'sdw'
GROUP BY 
  1

SELECT
  logtime AS "time",
  logseverity,
  logmessage,
  loguser,
  logdatabase,
  loghost
FROM gp_toolkit.gp_log_system
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(logtime) AND
  logseverity IN ($severity_level_var)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime,$__interval),
  avg(cpu_user) AS "User",
  avg(cpu_sys) AS "System",
  avg(cpu_user+cpu_sys) AS "Total"
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(ctime,$__interval),
  avg(ROUND(100.00 * mem_actual_used/mem_total, 2)) AS "In use"
FROM gpcc_system_history
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(ctime)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1
